long_description: Designed for use in emergency situations, this Swiss Army tool was developed in close collaboration with rescue and safety professionals,. Features a seatbelt cutter, window breaker and removable disc saw for shatterproof glass-crucial tools for an automobile rescue scenario. Contoured, luminescent handles, designed to be handled with or without gloves, make the tool easy to locate in the dark. Large locking blade is partially serrated and has a thumb hole for easy opening with one hand. Includes Phillips screwdriver, flat screwdriver, crate opener, bottle opener, wire stripper, reamer, punch, key ring, tweezers and toothpick. Line lock allows knife blade and crate opener to be locked in place.
